name: iom-typescript
description: Shared gRPC client for C2 platform

scripts.proto: buf generate --template buf.gen.yaml && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const pkg = JSON.stringify({type:'module'}, null, 2); const nodeDir = path.join('src', 'generated', 'node'); const webDir = path.join('src', 'generated', 'web'); fs.mkdirSync(nodeDir, {recursive:true}); fs.mkdirSync(webDir, {recursive:true}); fs.writeFileSync(path.join(nodeDir, 'package.json'), pkg); fs.writeFileSync(path.join(webDir, 'package.json'), pkg);"
scripts.proto:web: buf generate --template buf.gen.yaml && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const pkg = JSON.stringify({type:'module'}, null, 2); const nodeDir = path.join('src', 'generated', 'node'); const webDir = path.join('src', 'generated', 'web'); fs.mkdirSync(nodeDir, {recursive:true}); fs.mkdirSync(webDir, {recursive:true}); fs.writeFileSync(path.join(nodeDir, 'package.json'), pkg); fs.writeFileSync(path.join(webDir, 'package.json'), pkg);"
scripts.proto:all: npm run proto && npm run proto:web
